names: The Number of Subsets of a Set
remarks: The power set of a set is equinumerous to set exponentiation with a base of ordinal 2.  Proposition 10.44 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 96.  This is Metamath 100 proof #52.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2015.)
